content:
saulecabrera opened issue #7552:

I wonder if it would be worth omitting the offsets (except for jump targets) so that the diff would have shown only the add rsp, 4 instruction going away?

_Originally posted by @elliottt in https://github.com/bytecodealliance/wasmtime/pull/7547#discussion_r1395016578_
saulecabrera added the good first issue label to Issue #7552.
